edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_results.manager

Class WolfResultsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_results.manager.WolfResultsManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class WolfResultsManager
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer
    creates a manager the manager is a singleton and it updates and manages a racelist
    Author:
    William

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static WolfResultsManager getInstance()
        creates an instance if there is none, else returns the one that exists
        Returns:
        WolfResultsManager the singleton of this class. there can only be on instance of this class so this method checks to see if there is one and if yes, returns the current one, else creates one.
